imdb.plot outline: This new series follows the urgent work being carried out to save and protect animals around the world. From large scale conservation projects protecting endangered species, to tiny wildlife sanctuaries rescuing injured animals and the life or death dramas that unfold in vet's surgeries.
imdb.title: Animal Rescue Squad
plot: This new series follows the urgent work being carried out to save and protect animals around the world. From large scale conservation projects protecting endangered species, to tiny wildlife sanctuaries rescuing injured animals and the life or death dramas that unfold in vet's surgeries.
